long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension removes the migrant label used throughout the media, because first and foremost they're people.

Anywhere the word is used, it will be replaced by a the word "people" or "person".

Also works for the word "Immigrant".

Readability or correct grammar cannot be guaranteed.
There are no settings.
